Package org.apache.tiles.el

Class ELAttributeEvaluator

java.lang.Object
org.apache.tiles.core.evaluator.AbstractAttributeEvaluator
org.apache.tiles.el.ELAttributeEvaluator
All Implemented Interfaces:
AttributeEvaluator
public class ELAttributeEvaluator extends AbstractAttributeEvaluator
Evaluates string expression with typical EL syntax.
You can use normal EL syntax, knowing the root objects are Request, ApplicationContext and beans contained in request, session and application scope.
Since:
2.2.1
